review: My have the regular Amazon TV and it works perfectThis stick kept disconnecting and it was in the room with my wifi network
author: Craig

review: Really enjoying the fire stick lots of great mobies and shows to choose from its awesome
author: patricia gonzalez

review: Thought there would be more free programming available. There are too many wasted titles available.
author: John J. Johnson

review: Nice alternative to have when you want to ditch cable! Easy to install!
author: David R. Ibanez

review: I am not young any more but getting it hooked up was EASY even for me. I love the programming.  The only reason I give it 4 stars instead of 5 is because of the great trouble I had getting the back off to put the batteries in.  It is supposed to slide off but has to be pried open and I had to call for help so I didn't break it.  Otherwise it works great.
author: B. Gallion

review: Would be nice to plug head phones in to the remote
author: Tony Regennitter

review: I would have rated this 5 stars if I was able to watch HBO, Showtime, and Starz.  Since Xfinity is not listed as a TV subscriber on the fire stick, I am unable to.  This is something that needs to be fixed ASAP.  I would have not purchased it if I would have known that.
author: Cutsie
